idea:
I am an IT professional with long experience in Data Management. I am into Data Architecture, Data Governance, Data Privacy & Protection, Data Problem Solving, Training in Data and BigData. I have good experience in Automobile and Solar PV Power and Quantum Computing.

I am starting my journey in the areas to combine all this expertise, passion and skills and make life easier for the citizens.
name: Himanshu Jani

idea: Revoque is a first digital platform which  provieds services like road transport, custom clearance and ocean freight under one roof.  •It is a cutting edge web platform with which  importers and exporters can compare rates in  the real time and can manage their maritime  shipments quickly and easily from beginning to  end. Revoque makes it possible to book commercial  shipments in just a few minutes without having to wait for day’s or week’s time to get quotes.
name: Revoque Logistics Pvt Ltd

idea:
Have an idea to organise car wash market at affordable rate and provide jobs to unskilled labour by training. 


There are few companies in business, but, could not scale up due to high pricing structure.Apart,they are trying to cater one single customer.Hence,there cost of servicing customer is quite high. 


Our proposition is to cater bunch of customers staying in high and low rise apartments in metro cities.Idea is also to do washing service for Two wheelers as well.


Labour will be professionally trained and right allocation of manpower can increase productivity as there will be multiple vehicles to be served under one roof. 


Our services will be further integrated with insurance selling, car accesseories selling, car selling and financing,tyre selling etc


Initially we will grab the customer at lower rate than current car washers or at equal price for for additional services. E.g we can charge Rs 50 permonth for providing pumcture service at home.
name: Carsplash

idea: OUR SERVICES ARE SUPPLYING GOODS OF ELECTRICAL ITEMS, PIPES, CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS AND ALSO PROVIDING SERVICES IN THE CIVIL CONSTRUCTION FIELD AND PRINTING OF BOOKS, RECEIPTS, BROCHURES, ETC. WE ARE ALSO INTO PROVIDING PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS.
name: HASTI ASSOCIATES

idea: Finotize is a one-stop solution for early stage startups and millennials entrepreneurs by providing them all financial, compliance, IPR and web-related services under one roof at a price which can easily be affordable to everyone by connecting them to professionals.
name: FINOTIZE TECHNOCONSULT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Hello,

I'm kinal shah and belongs to Mumbai Maharashtra, recently registered with startup India. I came to know about Maharashtra_State_Innovative_Startup_Policy_2018.

I'm looking for a dealership/ franchise business in the electric vehicles / electronic system and food & beverages sectors in mumbai, maharashtra.

I have still not registered my business name or company name. Please guide me how i can register and start my business so I can take advantage of Maharashtra_State_Innovative_Startup_Policy_2018.
name: Branco International

idea: A clean protein company which leverages indian crops and food technology to create 100% plant based products starting off with a plant based liquid egg substitute
name: Evo Foods India Private Limited

idea: Spadix Retail Private Limited is a company of talent, passion and courage, a company which leaves mark in various industries. Spadix Retail is a newly incorporated company but the promoters have an experience more than twenty years. We bring the talent, tools and technology together to create business strategy that captures the Alliance’s imagination. At Spadix Retail, we understand the future of business because we are inventing it. Spadix Retail has always been committed to supporting the corporate and their commitment. We are based on the idea that strategic philanthropy-giving that is guided by focused research, creative planning and thoughtful execution-is the most effective way to achieve meaningful results. To this end, the Spadix Retail provides funding, volunteers, equipment and other forms of support for qualifying organizations or individual projects whose values are in line with the mandates. We create experiences that help to change the way people think, behave and perform. We provide effective and motivating business communications that engage, build understanding and increase performance. We offer great communications totally in line with your business needs. We are reseller and wholesaler of the goods.
name: SPADIX RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
OSHEISH DISTRIBUTION is a company that manufactures paper products, notably Notebooks, Booklets, Notepads, Umbrella, Sports Apparels, and Roachbooks that are popular across india and has left a lot of footprints around the world in the last couple of years. In fact one of our products are by far the best Indian souvenirs. Engaging actively with Musicians, Athletes, Artists, Writers, and Travellers. Most notably, 

OSheish FC established in 2016 promised to break all the stereotypes of Mumbai football, internally and externally. Introducing Innovative revenue model for the Club and the footballers. OFC has been one of the staunchest promoters of the financial welfare of footballers in various leagues and tournaments in Mumbai. Having a revamped design and lifestyle promoting education and job placements for our footballers who are seeking. We hope to become and export club for players to AFC nations with healthy and lucrative leagues. We encourage social duties and education for the poor. OSHEISH FC an Affliate Club of AIFF, WIFA, MDFA in March 2018 went on to lift MFL's Largest Division 3 Championship Title 2017-18, unbeaten. Felicitated by the Consul General of IRIran at Cooperage.
name: OSHEISH DISTRIBUTION PVT LTD
